item.title: How to Create an Ubuntu USB Install Medium
item.description: In Germany the corona numbers go through the roof, many school classes are already under quarantine, so there is no more time to waste and I need to setup a laptop for my son. I still own a 2012 Samsung 900X4D A02DE, which after upgrading RAM and SSD still works decently. As the laptop has no CD drive, I need to setup a USB stick to install a new operating system.
